ValidationRule.description: 6/4/21 9464 - Data specialist needs edit access to these fields at all times. Sharing settings has this object as read only for all other personas
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND((NOT($Profile.Name='Data Load API Only')&& NOT($Profile.Name='System Admin API Only')),(NOT(CONTAINS($User.Full_Name__c,'Interface User'))&& NOT(CONTAINS($User.Full_Name__c,'HBT API Integration'))),(CONTAINS(CreatedBy.Full_Name__c,'Interface User') || CONTAINS(CreatedBy.Full_Name__c,'HBT API Integration')), ISCHANGED(Name))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Cannot update a Record which is created from Integration
